name: Study Break
description:
Note: the game does work and load, it just takes a second. I guess maybe Godot HTML is generally slower?

A "desk-em-up" experience with a casual atmosphere that requires some finger dexterity.

It was going to be an exciting spring break trip to the beach, but there's always those professors that think a week away from school is a good time to study.

Zip file is original, unpatched version of game that was submitted before the deadline. HTML version has some minor fixes and dialogue edits.
